msg: Added stand alone clients for Bind, Delete and Add.  These new clients

author: jmachols
msg: Modified the add and modify interfaces.  Instead of making the
add and modify operations parse out an input stream and handle
all the entries, the operations will only accept one entry at a time.
The caller will need to use the parsing class and pass the entries
in one at a time.  This will clean up the code and handling of the reponse
for the caller.  It is much easier to write a loop and pass all the LDIF
entries in than deal with a list of error codes and figure out which
error code is associated with each LDIIF entry

author: jmachols
msg: Store each entry in a list instead of returning the entries one by one

author: wesmckean
msg: Modified sources for the NIO modules.
